cyclone.name: SALLY
cyclone.current_location: near the extreme southwest Florida peninsula
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the eastern Gulf of Mexico toward the north-central Gulf Coast (LA/MS coast)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Ochlockonee River FL to Okaloosa/Walton County Line FL (Florida Panhandle)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Florida peninsula, Florida Keys, eastern Gulf Coast and north-central Gulf Coast from coastal Alabama westward to southeast Louisiana
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional breezy conditions from distant outer bands; winds expected to remain below tropical-storm force.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for the South Carolina coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Possible scattered showers from peripheral moisture, generally less than 1–2 inches.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk along southeastern U.S. beaches.
